tool.name: Count.seqs
tool.description: (aka make.table) counts the number of sequences represented by the representative

param.name: use
param.label: Use a Group file to include counts for groups

param.name: group
param.label: group - Group file for the tree

param.name: groups
param.label: groups - Groups to display
param.help: All groups displayed if none are selected.

param.name: large
param.label: large - Datasets are large and may not fit in RAM

tool.help:
@MOTHUR_OVERVIEW@
**Command Documenation**
The count.seqs_ command counts the number of sequences represented by the representative sequence in a name_ file and generates a count_table_. If a group_ file is given, it will also provide the group count breakdown.
